CreateChimeWebhookConfiguration.name: CreateChimeWebhookConfiguration
CreateChimeWebhookConfiguration.description: Creates an AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configuration.

CreateSlackChannelConfiguration.name: CreateSlackChannelConfiguration
CreateSlackChannelConfiguration.description: Creates an AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configuration.

DeleteChimeWebhookConfiguration.name: DeleteChimeWebhookConfiguration
DeleteChimeWebhookConfiguration.description: Deletes an AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configuration.

DeleteSlackChannelConfiguration.name: DeleteSlackChannelConfiguration
DeleteSlackChannelConfiguration.description: Deletes an AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configuration.

DescribeChimeWebhookConfigurations.name: DescribeChimeWebhookConfigurations
DescribeChimeWebhookConfigurations.description: Lists all AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configurations in an AWS Account.

DescribeSlackChannelConfigurations.name: DescribeSlackChannelConfigurations
DescribeSlackChannelConfigurations.description: Lists all AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configurations in an AWS account.

DescribeSlackChannels.name: DescribeSlackChannels
DescribeSlackChannels.description:
Lists all public Slack channels in the Slack workspace connected to the AWS Account
                                                onboarded with AWS Chatbot service.

DescribeSlackWorkspaces.name: DescribeSlackWorkspaces
DescribeSlackWorkspaces.description:
Lists all authorized Slack workspaces connected to the AWS Account onboarded with
                                                AWS Chatbot service.

GetSlackOauthParameters.name: GetSlackOauthParameters
GetSlackOauthParameters.description:
Generate OAuth parameters to request Slack OAuth code to be used by the AWS Chatbot
                                                service.

RedeemSlackOauthCode.name: RedeemSlackOauthCode
RedeemSlackOauthCode.description:
Redeem previously generated parameters with Slack API, to acquire OAuth tokens to
                                                be used by the AWS Chatbot service.

UpdateChimeWebhookConfiguration.name: UpdateChimeWebhookConfiguration
UpdateChimeWebhookConfiguration.description: Updates an AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configuration.

UpdateSlackChannelConfiguration.name: UpdateSlackChannelConfiguration
UpdateSlackChannelConfiguration.description: Updates an AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configuration.
